description: Gets the status of the specified copy product operation.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: CopyProductToken
parameters.description: The token for the copy product operation. This token is returned by  CopyProduct.

nested_items.name: CopyProductStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the copy product operation.

nested_items.name: TargetProductId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the copied product.
